item.title: VMware Aria Operations | Use vCenter TAGS/Custom Groups/Super Metrics to get VM Details
item.author: Dale Hassinger
item.description: How to group VMs together in VMware Aria Operations using vCenter TAGs and show resource usage totals across all VMs within the custom group
